meanings.definition: To give as a gift or honor.
meanings.sent1: She bestows kindness upon everyone she meets.
meanings.sent2: The queen bestows knighthood on the brave warriors.
meanings.sent3: The magician bestows a magical gift upon the young child.
meanings.sent4: The sun bestows its warm rays upon the earth each morning.
meanings.sent5: The teacher bestows knowledge upon her eager students.

meanings.sent1: The principal bestows awards upon the top students.
meanings.sent2: The president bestows medals on the heroes of the nation.
meanings.sent3: The chef bestows a delicious meal upon the hungry guests.
meanings.sent4: The artist bestows beauty upon the canvas with each brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: The judge bestows justice upon the accused in the courtroom.

meanings.sent1: Nature bestows abundant resources for all living creatures.
meanings.sent2: The scholarship bestows financial aid to deserving students.
meanings.sent3: The fairy bestows a wish upon the young child in the storybook.
meanings.sent4: Time bestows wisdom upon those who experience its passage.
meanings.sent5: The rain bestows life-giving water to the thirsty plants.
